synopsis.text:
When middle school student Haneru Tobitatsu isn't in class, he's busting moves outside Memorial Hall, inspired by his idol, Jey El, the world's hottest dance sensation. Little does he know, his secret practice sessions aren't so secret after all, as Kanon Otosaki, an online dance celebrity known as Rhythm, has been secretly watching him.

One day, the two meet and discover the joy of dancing together, leading to the formation of their dance group, Tribe Cool Crew. Alongside new friends and fellow dancers, Kumonosuke, Mizuki, and Yuzuru, they dive headfirst into the world of street dancing, facing off against rivals in intense dance battles.

As they grow and mature, Haneru and Kanon learn the true value of teamwork and friendship, fueling their determination to one day share the stage with their idol, Jey El. Join them on their journey in this first-of-its-kind, full-fledged dance anime from Japan, depicting the thrills and challenges of coming-of-age through dance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
